hopobject.name: U-Boot (V1)
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.0.3) Gecko/2008092417 Firefox/3.0.3
hopobject.body:
U-Boot V1 source available at

http://code.google.com/p/beagleboard/downloads/list

does work on BeagleBoard. But code quality isn't ready for sending upstream. Goal of this project is to clean up code to make it upstream ready and then push it into mainline U-Boot (V1).

Recent efforts are coordinated on the OMAP3 branch on the u-boot-arm git repository:

http://git.denx.de/cgi-bin/gitweb.cgi?p=u-boot/u-boot-arm.git;a=summary
hopobject.shortdesc: Make U-Boot (V1) upstream ready and integrate it into upstream U-Boot
